experience: You and Colin both know Anthony Argenziano, Jay Witherspoon, and 6 others

I specialize in building top-tier tech and construction teams for companies ranging from startups to mid-size enterprises nationwide. I am ultimately committed to quality, efficiency, and making finding that next long-term addition to your team a fast and simple process.CyberCoders provides a cutting-edge, proprietary machine learning and AI-driven platform that enable me to take my recruiting abilities to the next level. My quality-driven approach to recruiting coupled with these resources means that whether you are a client or a candidate, your goals will be met. FAST.  What you will get when working with CyberCoders:Technology - We have a cutting-edge Applicant Tracking System. All proprietary technology that is constantly being improved by one of the best and brightest engineering teams anywhere. This technology allows us to reach out to candidates on nearly every job board out there.  We are also able to reach candidates and alert them of our jobs when they are reading online magazines, industry journals, or when visiting other social media sites. We have over 40 million candidates in our system who receive our daily job alerts.Industry Leaders - We have partnerships with all of the major job boards, which means that our jobs remain in higher positions longer, thus giving them better visibility. We have premium partnerships with Dice, Indeed, and LinkedIn that no other recruiting agency possesses, which gives our jobs much more visibility and hits. It also allows us to more effectively recruit via those platforms.Advertising / Marketing - We spend more money on advertising per job than any other agency.  We are everywhere on the internet.

• Grew SAP Install Base and Net New business in small to medium sized enterprise market ($100m - $1b revenue) through effective cold calling, collaborating with partners, and event networking.• Attended SAP Partner Sales Boot Camp and received valuable training on a vast array of enterprise software products and sales methodologies from top tier professionals and thought leaders.• Worked closely with marketing to develop content and formulate effective/robust strategic initiatives in order to improve prospect to client conversion rate.• Earned SAP Software Sales Executive Level 1 Certification.

• Managed B2B sales and marketing for startup IT services and solutions company and played key role in establishing as a major player in highly competitive market.• Directly responsible for pipeline and generating revenue growth of up to 300% year over year through informative content marketing and closing many valuable hardware, software, and service deals.• Successfully acquired many high value accounts in small-midsize business market by effectively generating warm to hot leads, performing inside/outside sales calls to key contacts and C-level executives, and employing consultative sales methodology.• Collaborated with distributors, partners, and vendors to drive revenue growth by improving prospect to client conversion rate, upselling based on genuine customer needs, and providing excellent service.• Coordinated events, hosted webinars, conducted customer interviews, and performed other strategic initiatives that led to enhanced customer acquisition and retention.• Achieved personnel growth of 12 employees due to substantial gains in new business.• Produced sales scripts, objection handling protocols, and quotas for inside sales representatives.• Utilized Salesforce CRM software to build and manage prospect and client databases, execute sales and marketing initiatives, and implement workflows.• Composed all content for emails, website, social media outlets, blogs, ads, and landing pages.• Tracked and measured results of marketing initiatives using Google Analytics.• Instituted marketing objectives, protocols, and best practices for reaching target audience.

• Established startup as key competitor in saturated market within growing natural foods industry.• Managed sales and marketing in all retail channels across Southwest United States, resulting in acquisition and retention of over 250 accounts from global chains to small independents.• Achieved year over year revenue growth of up to 500% through multiple product variations, branding alterations, and strategy refreshes.• Built three-tier distribution network from ground up including 5 major regional and national distributors, leading to significant expansion of territory and account base.• Activated many key accounts through successful sales calls with regional buyers.• Effectively managed over 100 distributor sales representatives in addition to grocery and natural broker networks, which consisted of up to 20 representatives across multiple regions.• Assembled, trained, and supervised 15-representative field sales and marketing team.• Initiated summer internship program, leading to substantial increases in account base, improved account management and customer service, and sales growth during most critical selling season.

• Drove account development and sales growth for startup natural beverage brand. • Coordinated pricing, promotion, and placement within San Diego area retail accounts.• Supervised engagement of account managers and buyers by distributor sales team.• Met critical sales objectives and gained valuable experience selling to key accounts in a highly competitive market and declining economy.• Contributed to company/product branding by writing content, providing creative packaging input, and designing marketing collateral.

I had the pleasure of working with Murilo when he was recently searching for a new position after moving to the U.S. from Brazil. By the end of our very first phone call it was obvious what a tremendously bright, talented, and motivated individual he is. It was also clear that he is an all-around great guy and he proved this throughout the process and beyond. In my time working with Murilo, he demonstrated impressive professionalism, responsiveness, and communication/interpersonal skills, and, aside from all of this, he proved that he had the expert-level technical skills necessary in order to land a job where dozens of others fell short.Murilo is one of the rare people who possess both incredibly strong technical acumen and emotional intelligence/soft skills along with the drive to succeed at anything he wishes to achieve. I firmly believe he would be an amazing asset to any organization that is lucky enough to have him on their team.

September 21, 2017, Colin worked with RJ but at different companies

I worked with RJ last year when I was searching far and wide for someone who could make the cut for a role with an extremely selective client. The search was taking far longer than I was expecting and certainly longer than I'm used to. I was just about to call it quits when, out of nowhere, came the end of my troubles in the form of the technically masterful RJ Gomez!I spoke with RJ and he seemed to be just the guy for the job and it turned out he was exactly what they were looking for: a very bright engineer with strong interpersonal skills who could meet the needs of a tremendously fast-growing organization. Of course, he got the job and I was very pleased to hear that within a year he had already been promoted and has turned out to be a true asset to them just like he would be to any employer.In short, if anyone can do the job... it is RJ!

summary: There are three main tangible and intangible qualities that one must possess in order to achieve great things: 1) Creativity/innovative thinking, excellent communication, and the ability to effectively cultivate long-term relationships. 2) A great attitude, strong drive/motivation, and consistency.I am passionate about bringing these qualities to my clients and candidates alike in order to provide the absolute best service possible and find the perfect fit for their specific needs. FAST! I specialize in, but am not limited to:Tech: Web (Application) Developers, Software Engineers/Architects, Systems Administrators and Engineers, Mobile Developers, Database Administrators/Engineers/Architects, Software Quality Assurance Engineers, Embedded Software Engineers, Product and Project Managers, Security/Cryptography Specialists, and Technology Executives (CTOs, CIOs, VPs, etc.).Construction:  Project Managers, Project Engineers, Construction Managers, Superintendents, Estimators.Biotech/Pharma: (Bio)statistics Professionals, Clinical Data Managers, Research Scientists.
